title: 1, 2, & 3 John Week 1 with John Greco
description:
In this episode of the She Reads Truth Podcast, Raechel and Amanda are joined by SRT’s content director, John Greco, to begin a two-week series on the books of 1, 2, and 3 John. They talk about working from home with kids, the apostle John’s fascination with light, and what it might have felt like to be the last of the twelve disciples left standing. These letters remind us that no matter what’s taking place in our world, the love of God never changes.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth 1, 2 & 3 John reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com.
